name: MiteMakesRight
description:
Competition is fierce in the world of dust mites, knock of all other mites from your leaves.
The game is multiplayer only.



Credits:
Bob Quenneville - Code
Samuel Gélineau - Code & Sound
Cedric Barrancos - Code
Romain Nascimento - Code
Guilluame Demers-Loiselle - Art
Bruno Deschatelets - Art
